detectors.description:
ECO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#227-260) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#54-56)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#60-63)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#67-70)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#8)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#57-59)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#9)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#6)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#71-75)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#5)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#7)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#4)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ECO.sol#64-66)
